items.name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38
items.description: The Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 38 is a reliable running shoe designed for everyday training.

items.name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
items.description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is a high-performance running shoe with a responsive cushioning system.

items.name: Converse Chuck Taylor All Star
items.description: The Converse Chuck Taylor All Star is a classic casual shoe with a durable canvas upper.

items.name: Vans Old Skool
items.description: The Vans Old Skool is a classic skate shoe with a durable canvas and suede upper.

items.name: Puma Cali Sport
items.description: The Puma Cali Sport is a stylish and comfortable casual shoe with a suede upper.

items.name: Jordan 1 Mid
items.description: The Jordan 1 Mid is a classic basketball shoe featuring a leather upper and Air-Sole unit.

items.name: Nike Kyrie 7
items.description: The Nike Kyrie 7 is a high-performance basketball shoe designed for quick cuts and fast moves.

items.name: Timberland 6-Inch Premium Boot
items.description: The Timberland 6-Inch Premium Boot is a durable work boot with a waterproof leather upper.

items.name: Dr. Martens 1460
items.description: The Dr. Martens 1460 is a durable work boot with a leather upper and Goodyear welt construction.

items.name: Thursday Boot Co. Captain
items.description: The Rugged & Resilient matte leather upper, sourced exclusively from Tier 1 USA cattle hides, was custom created to look great with years of hard wear and minimal care.

items.name: Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans
items.description: The Levi's 501 Original Fit Jeans are a classic straight leg jean made with non-stretch denim.

items.name: Wrangler's Competition Active Flex Relaxed Fit Jean
items.description: When you need nothing but the best denim on your side, no jean can compare to a Wrangler Competition Slim Jean with Active Flex

items.name: Todd Snyder Straigh Fit 5-Pocket Chino Pant
items.description: A new fit for our most popular pants that merges the best features of your favorite denim and your trusty chinos into one truly perfect pair of pants.

items.name: Nike Dri-FIT Men's Running Pants
items.description: The Nike Dri-FIT Men's Running Pants are a comfortable and moisture-wicking running pant.

items.name: H&M Slim Fit Chinos
items.description: The H&M Slim Fit Chinos are a stylish and comfortable slim fit chino made with a cotton blend.

items.name: Brooks Moment 5in. Running Shorts
items.description: Get running shorts that make your legs feel great. Stretch fabric, a comfortable liner, and a convenient pocket make the Moment 5in. Short an item you'll grab again and again.

items.name: Carhartt Crawford Double-Front Bib Overalls
items.description: The Carhartt® Crawford Double-Front Bib Overalls were built for rough and tough days. Rugged Flex® technology moves with you for all-day comfort and style, while the multi-compartment bib pocket with zip closure organizes and stores essentials.

items.name: adidas Tiro 19 Training Pants
items.description: The adidas Tiro 19 Training Pants are a comfortable and moisture-wicking training pant.

items.name: Levi's 501 Original Frayed Jean Shorts
items.description: A cultural icon, Levi's brought us the first-ever jean shorts, and these now feature a waist-defining high rise, which will have you looking stunning.

items.name: Everlane Organic Wide-Leg Pant
items.description: Featuring the same waist-nipping, butt-boosting, and leg-lengthening look you love from the original Wide-Leg Crop Pant—now in organic cotton. Soft. Breathable. Gentler on you and the planet.
